CustomField.description: Designated Market Area (DMA®) for this business location. DMA® is a geographic area which defines each television market. DMA®s are updated annually by the A. C. Nielsen Company based on historical television viewing patterns. There are currently 210 DMA®s in the US. DMA® is determined by locating this business address, using latitude and longitude, on a US DMA® map.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Designated Market Area (DMA®) for this business location. DMA® is a geographic area which defines each television market.
CustomField.label: DMA
